column4: I can't eject my CD/ DVD, I have to eject it thru the Desktop. Is this normal?
you mean 'eject' as in hit the button and it pops out?
the desktop/gnome has accesed it and has it 'locked' - its normal
thats not a "DM" login screen. They are using one of the many "desklet" type tools for the weather report.
